itunes:title: Episode 532 - DB Sports Companion Show 01/08/20 - Don't Hijack Jesus Dabo!
title: Episode 532 - DB Sports Companion Show 01/08/20 - Don't Hijack Jesus Dabo!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the College Football National Championship including our final predictions, why Dabo Swinney shouldn't claim Jesus for his team only, how LSU NEEDS to win it all THIS year, the Cowboys and Giants head coaching hire...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the College Football National Championship including our final predictions, why Dabo Swinney shouldn't claim Jesus for his team only, how LSU NEEDS to win it all THIS year, the Cowboys and Giants head coaching hires, this week's NFL playoff predictions, and if Tom Brady will leave.
